title: 44 Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "Well," continued Betty, "I had gone to a coffee morning at St George's, in the art centre, with a friend, who's got a daughter there – a very talented girl – and I'm friendly with her mother, who lives over in Gordon Terrace, and she very kindly invited me to come to the coffee morning. Anyway, we went off and there was a stand with all sorts of things which had been baked by the girls and by the staff too.
